mapper.select: select distinct rm.menu_id from t_sys_role_menu rm left join t_sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT r.id, r.role_name, r.role_key,r.role_sort,r.create_time FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
